description.value: The sticky sap produced by your vined body has healing properties. You produce 1d4 vials of sap each day when you are exposed to natural sunlight for at least 4 hours. A creature that drinks a vial of the sap as an Interact action restores 2d8 Hit Points. This effect has the healing and vitality traits.

publication.title: Starfinder Murder in Metal City Deluxe Adventure
